org.sakaiproject.login.filter

Class NakamuraAuthenticationFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.login.filter.NakamuraAuthenticationFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.Filter

    public class NakamuraAuthenticationFilter
extends Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter
    A simple Filter which can be used for container authentication (e.g. like CAS) against a Nakamura instance. Because Nakamura does not currently have a redirecting authentication URL, the user must already be authenticated to Nakamura.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NakamuraAuthenticationFilter.NakamuraHttpServletRequestWrapper
      A HttpServletRequestWrapper which uses the passed NakamuraAuthenticationFilter.NakamuraPrincipal as the current user when completing the servlet request.
      static class  NakamuraAuthenticationFilter.NakamuraPrincipal
      A simple implementation of Principal which will be used by NakamuraAuthenticationFilter.NakamuraHttpServletRequestWrapper.

      The nakamura user that has permissions to GET /var/cluster/user.cookie.json.

      • CONFIG_PRINCIPAL

        public static final String CONFIG_PRINCIPAL
        The principal that will be used when connecting to Nakamura REST end-point. Must have permissions to read /var/cluster/user.cookie.json.

      • filterEnabled

        protected boolean filterEnabled
        Filter will be disabled by default.

      • validateUrl

        protected String validateUrl
        The Nakamura RESTful service to validate authenticated users. A good default for common hybrid implementations is supplied.
        See Also:
        CONFIG_VALIDATE_URL

      • principal

        protected String principal
        The nakamura user that has permissions to GET /var/cluster/user.cookie.json. A good default for common hybrid implementations is supplied.
